column5: Here is a Sumo 13.5 Greenback caught yesterday by "Fisherdog" on the Red River. http://im1.shutterfly.com/procserv/4...38c60000001610 He lost another, even bigger, in the hole. Ed "Backwater Eddy" Carlson ><,sUMo,>

Some of these fish stories are amazing. A 31 inch fish that weighs 13.5 pounds! Must be one of those new high quantity scales used for weighing that one. Better yet a tale of a 31 inch fish with a 22 inch girth, lmaorotf!

Ya....well...believe what you wish, I guess? Yet extraordinary girths on the Red River system walleye is not too uncommon. Or for walleye on many other like forage rich systems for that fact. But ja know, when you anonymous, calling folks liars has not too much weight behind it either? ;)

Here's a big one that I'd appreciate a little guestimation on. One of the lads from the Gouin Reservoir area that I fish regularly every summer sent me this pic - no details but it's a biggie.http://groups.msn.com/McQonFishing/f...oto&PhotoID=42
Hey amazed..wanna see a 31 inch eye with a 23 inch girth? Click below.http://www.takemefishing.ca/images/walk2.jpg Seeing is believing, huh?
Dats a ><sUMo>

Here are 2 better pic's of Peters ><,sUMo,> Red River piggy Greenback. http://im1.shutterfly.com/procserv/4...d6130000001610 http://im1.shutterfly.com/procserv/4...57580000002613 Man....Darn Purdy Eh? Just think, he had a bigger one in the hole that day. With two witnesses to boot, so that ain't no fish tail.

Hey Dick...Them Eagles can eat a bunch of Hog Walleye. Before we give them the big girls we put Hot sauce on the fish. Those Eagles really fly fast after that lunch. Just dont let them fly over your boat...it gets messy.
hot sauce huh? i'll give it a shot... but will make sure to keep my eyes to the sky.
Dick, Get off the computer and go to work !!!!!!
Last Mountain, SK 11.4# 31+ inches Buzz Bombing in 35 feet of water Honsie
Lake Erie off of Ruggles Reef,31" 13lbs.2oz. #20 jet diver and stinger spoon (tangerine).May 11.
Joker, if i went back to work i would not have any fun,,,besides... i own the company so whats the point?
A side order of loon wings with that fish, Dick? Good to see you beat that restraining order and are allowed back out here again.
31.5 little chamberlein narrows june 19th jig 3/8 chartreuse and minnow. any color will work as long as it is chartreuse!

Mine was a 28.5 on Lac Seul on May 28. Let me tell you about the little ones. We must have caught literally hundreds less then 12 inches. It's almost like deep sea fishing. Get the bait through the little ones and maybe get a nice fish. Lac Seul is going to be great for years to come.
dont much care for them loonie wings,,, they are too fishy,,, maybe some spring bear gallblader, deep fat fried,,, hmmmm
LIke you I usually fish all night.I'll sleep when I die. For now, I got some fishing to do.
Looks like everyone did well this year! My biggest was 33" She hit on one of my homemade crawler harness' and was my all time biggest so it was especially awsome!
32" with a 22" girth, (C&R) Red River, Fargo ND. Caught on a Salmo Sting. Ed "Backwater Eddy" Carlson ><,sUMo,>
Eddy, Whats a Salmo Sting? <{{}}><

It's a nifty crankbait. They come in conventional and a suspending model. Here is a link if you wish to see what they look like Reels.www.salmofishing.com/lures/sting.html Here is a nice Zander taken on a Sting.www.salmofishing.com/lures/images/sting_fish.gif Ed "Backwater Eddy" Carlson ><,sUMo,>
My biggest Walleye this year was 16 1/2" long and had to weigh at least one pound. She hangs over my fireplace with my spike Buck.
this year 15.3 nipawan walleye,, on a rig
Uf-Da! On the Canadian end Eh? Ed "Backwater Eddy" Carlson ><,sUMo,>
mine was a 29 inch, 12 lb sow. cut out the cheek meat and soaked them in milk for a day to get rid of the grease and ate em. thru the rest to the eagles. they gotta eat too

Its that time of the tear again. Lets hear from the WC gang about your BIG WALLEYE in 2003. Mine.....31.5" Lac Seul 7/6/03 Jig & Minnow. Caught this big girl in 15' of water around entrance to Broad Lake....RELEASED TO FIGHT AGAIN
28.5 inches, Lac Seul, first week of August
26" for myself only. Though myself with 2 buddies caught in one day this year- 11 walleyes 26 inches to 30 inches out of Birch Island Resort. The largest that trip was 31 inches. Don
Gotta luv them Minaki 'Hawgs. My biggest out there this year was 31" WrD
Mine was a 29" Minaki hawg caught in the middle of June at Trapper's on Big Sand.
Mine was caught, third week June. Off of the Big beach. Thanks to some advice from RTMG. I released her & promised her that I'll keep her when she hits the 34" range WrD

Not quite sure how big mine was. I just had a picture taken and released it. Some said it was 34 inches+ I know it was my second biggest walleye ever. Here's the picture: https://www.walleyecentral.com/fish_mahumba.shtml Roger Mayer.
Man that thing is mean lookin' and ugly.The fish is kinda spooky, too. :);)

Good one bigfish!!! I have so many big walleye pictures with closed eyes and messed up hair it ain't funny! But just a note......I have seen you in some pictures and man oh man we gotta get some sleep or something! Roger Mayer.

My 11 year old son caught a 30 1/4" on Lac Seul in June. The proud Poppy could only muster a 28". Two 29"'s in 2002, so I remain in the hunt for the one that break's 30" for me. My 8-eight year old daughter is coming on the Lac Seul trip this year, so I once again expect to be shut out while she takes the fish of the trip. That would be a great moment. She already is a better fisherperson than I because she will fish in a steady rain, in the cold, and never complains. Just asks 100's of questions about fishing and wants to keep staying out....IA Walleye
